summary: Calma-Mente: A meditation and breathing app with a start screen, breathing exercises with visual animations, diary feature for mood tracking, and Internet Identity authentication for saving user data

existing_features.title: Create a start/welcome screen that introduces the Calma-Mente app and provides navigation to the main features (home, breathing exercises, diary)
Create a home screen with navigation that allows users to access breathing exercises and diary features
Implement breathing exercise feature with visual animations that guide users through breathing patterns
Create a diary feature that allows authenticated users to track their mood and reflections
Implement Internet Identity authentication to allow users to securely log in and save their progress and diary entries
Design the app with a calming, meditative visual theme using soft colors, serene imagery, and gentle typography that promotes relaxation and mindfulness
Render generated background and icon images as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated for use throughout the app
Add a collection of motivational and inspirational messages related to mindfulness, meditation, and mental wellness that can be displayed throughout the app
Display a random motivational message on the home page that changes each time the user visits or refreshes
Show a motivational message after completing a breathing exercise cycle to encourage continued practice
Add a prominent Android download link or button in the app footer that directs users to download the Android version of Calma-Mente
Configure the link to point to a placeholder URL (e.g., '#android-download') that can be updated with the actual Play Store or APK download URL when available
Add 'Matheus Gama, CEO' attribution in the app footer below the Android download button

new_feature_requests.summary: Internet Identity authentication to save user data
Add messages about how precious life is
Add a new collection of motivational messages focused on the preciousness and value of life to the existing motivational message array in the backend
Add Matheus Gama as CEO of the app
